name: Misaki Aggressive!
overview: Misaki Aggressive tells the story of Misaki, a young girl that is the granddaughter of a dojo fighting master. She lives with him, and he trains her in the art of fighting. The gameplay is about growing the stats of the main character and her comrades in order to prepare for the different fights that they will have to face during the game. To do that, she can spy on other fighters, train to gain strength, and make different decisions in order to gain or lose her comrades' loyalty and add other characters to her group. Another feature of the game is to challenge other female fighters. The game features Japanese voice acting for all the game characters. The fighting parts are played using a tactical RPG style in which the player moves the characters chooses between different kinds of attacks.
